name: Fall Fungi
description: Create your own colorful fungi using just one Fall Festival bundle. Knit them with simple color changes at the cap, solid, or add stripes and make them unique. Each mushroom can be your own distinct combination.
full_text: Create your own colorful fungi using just one Fall Festival bundle. Knit them with simple color changes at the cap, solid, or add stripes and make them unique. Each mushroom can be your own distinct combination. EXPERIENCE LEVEL Advanced Beginner MATERIALS WOOLSTOK (WORSTED) BUNDLE (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12yds): 1 bundle (Fall Festival) Stitch markers Tapestry needle Stuffing FINISHED MEASURMENTS SMALL CIRCUMFERENCE: approx 5½” after stuffing at largest area SMALL HEIGHT: approx 3” MEDIUM CIRCUMFERENCE: 7¾” after stuffing at largest area MEDIUM HEIGHT: approx 3½” LARGE CIRCUMFERENCE: 9” after stuffing at largest area LARGE HEIGHT: approx 4 ¼” COLOR SHOWN Mossy Green No. 1326 Earth Ivy No. 1309 Gravel Road No. 1302 Drift Wood No. 1312 Highland Fleece No. 1303 Ember Glow No. 1323 Rusted Roof No. 1311
